content: i needed a nice quick pattern for holiday gifts that was functional and still looked nice i love knitting fingerless mitts and i love the practicality of convertibles but i wanted something simple and not too fiddly plus i donʼt like the flappy bit on top of my hand when not using the convertible part i came up with a mitt with a nice long top that can be folded down or unfolded to cover your fingers that you can knit in one evening
